1.0.name: wordpress/nextgen-facebook
1.0.description:
An essential plugin for every WordPress website.

Open Graph and SEO

NGFB Open Graph+ adds Open Graph and Search Engine Optimization (SEO) HTML tags to the head section of webpages. These HTML tags are used by Google Search, Google+, Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn and many more, to describe and display your content correctly (title, description, keyword tags, images, videos, author profiles, etc.).

Find out more... What are Open Graph and Twitter Card Meta Tags?

Once installed and activated, NGFB Open Graph+ adds all the essential Open Graph meta tags to your webpages immediately -- there's no need to configure any additional settings. Although, if you have an image that represen
